text: (napiye!) Oru nalil allah, (tan) tutarkalai onru certtu ‘‘ninkal enatu tutai makkalitam etutturaitta camayattil) avarkal unkalukku enna patil kurinarkal?'' Enru ketpan. Atarkavarkal, (‘‘nankal uyirutan irunta varai avarkalutaiya velikkolattaiye nankal arivom. Atarku maraka ullattil ullataiyo, nankal irantapin avarkal ceytataiyo) nankal ariyamattom. Niccayamaka nitan maraivana anaittaiyum nankarintavan'' enru kuruvarkal
